subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=c|rs=口07}}

# [[Tang dynasty]]
# [[China]], [[Chinese]], [[Sino-]]
# [[foreign]]
# [[baseless]], [[bogus]]
# [[abrupt]], [[sudden]]

subSections.title: Readings
subSections.text:
{{rfv-pronunciation|ja}}
{{ja-readings
|goon=どう<だう
|kanon=とう<たう
|toon=たん
|soon=たん
|kun=から-, もろこし-
|nanori=かろ}}

subSections.title: Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{wp|lang=ja}} {{wp|Tang dynasty}}
{{ja-kanjitab|とう|yomi=o}} {{IPAchar|/tau/}} → {{IPAchar|/tɔː/}} → {{IPAchar|/toː/}} From {{bor|ja|ltc|sort=とう|-}} {{ltc-l|唐}}.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|y=ko|とう|acc=1|acc_ref=NHK}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|とう|hhira=たう}}

# [[foreign]] [[land]]s in general

subSections.title: Derived terms
Idioms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|唐へ投げ銀|とう へ なげ-がね}}

subSections.title: Proper noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|proper|とう|hhira=たう}}

# {{lb|ja|historical|sort=とう}} name of various [[Chinese]] [[dynasty|dynasties]]:
## the [[Tang dynasty]] (618-907 {{CE}})
## the {{m|ja|後唐|tr=Kōtō||{{w|Later Tang}}}} (923-937 {{CE}})
## the {{m|ja|後唐|tr=Nantō||{{w|Southern Tang}}}} (937–976 {{CE}})
# {{lb|ja|dated||sort=とう}} [[China]] in general

Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|から|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

Derived terms
Noun
Proper noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|proper|から}}

# {{lb|ja|formal|dated|sort=から}} the name of [[China]] during the {{w|Tang dynasty}} (618-907 {{CE}}}

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|唐 人|^から ひと}}, {{ja-r|唐%人|^から%-びと|a [[Chinese]] or [[Korean]] [[person]]; a [[foreigner]] from [[China]] or [[Korea]]}}
